channel.title: Bash Bunny on ZySec
channel.description: Recent content in Bash Bunny on ZySec

item.title: The Bash Bunny
item.author: thenytfury@zysec.space (Mohammed Zanil)
item.description: I have decided to learn and have fun with a new tool called the Bash Bunny by Hak5. I have decided to create a series of posts dedicated to this learning journey. In this introductory post, i’ll explain what the Bash Bunny is. It looks like a normal USB device with an LED and a switch on it.
